about_the_game:
The Supporter DLC includes the Merged Hero【Templar】, dedicated to all of you who additionally support game developers. Thank you for your attention and support. We will continue to work hard to bring you the best adventure experience in Time Walker: Dark World.

【Templar】

"May the light be with you, or with dead enemies"

Recipe: Divine Staff + Sword & Shield

Talent: Light Barrier

(Passive) +200% Healing Effect

(Active) Inflict 1 "Light Barrier" and "Strong" to self when taking Healing.

The first time HP <50%, heal all Heroes 600 HP and inflicts 1 "Light Barrier"; if already in "Holy Light", inflicts 1 more "Light Barrier".

Holy Light: +0.1 AS, -5% CD, +5% Healing Effect, stack up to 6 times

Light Barrier: All Heroes +20 DEF, +400 Max HP, stack up to 2 times

Thanks for your like and support to Time Walkers: Dark World.
detailed_description:
The Supporter DLC includes the Merged Hero【Templar】, dedicated to all of you who additionally support game developers. Thank you for your attention and support. We will continue to work hard to bring you the best adventure experience in Time Walker: Dark World.

【Templar】

"May the light be with you, or with dead enemies"

Recipe: Divine Staff + Sword & Shield

Talent: Light Barrier

(Passive) +200% Healing Effect

(Active) Inflict 1 "Light Barrier" and "Strong" to self when taking Healing.

The first time HP <50%, heal all Heroes 600 HP and inflicts 1 "Light Barrier"; if already in "Holy Light", inflicts 1 more "Light Barrier".

Holy Light: +0.1 AS, -5% CD, +5% Healing Effect, stack up to 6 times

Light Barrier: All Heroes +20 DEF, +400 Max HP, stack up to 2 times

Thanks for your like and support to Time Walkers: Dark World.

name: Time Walker - Supporter Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows10
  • Processor: 2.0Ghz
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 680,AMD R9 280X
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows10
  • Processor: 3.0 Ghz
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 680,AMD R9 280X

supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*, Japanese*, Korean*
*languages with full audio support
